name: CosmoDream
description:
CosmoDream - Submission for Godot Wild Jam #55

Space travelers, forced to remain in hibernation, share a collective dream. However, their peaceful slumber is suddenly disrupted by a mad AI that begins to disconnect them one by one from life support systems. Will the heroes be able to resist the terrifying machine and make their way through the dreams to the heart of the AI to disable it before it disables them all?

CONTROLS

Arrows - movement

Space - jump/double jump

F - melee

Q - shotgun

R - dash

W - shield

Credits

A work of Tape1, astro_monkey, AnonJedi and Sergei Meku
